type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Evaluating Condition Error

definition.text: An error occured while evaluation a User Defined Condition at the Trading System.

paragraphs.text: While running at the TS, the Low Frequency Trading Bot encounteren an error while trying to evaluate one of your conditions defined at the Trading System. Conditions are arbitrary Javascript Code that user can write as they want and in some cases they do not write valid Javascript for Nod JS.
In the following section you will find the specific information received when this error occured.
You will only see it if you opened this page as a result of the error actually happening.
The following is the Error Message of the Exception that occured at the LF Trading Bot:
